titleInfo.title: Rotunda of Hotel Hermitage, Nashville, Tennessee, 1912

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A postcard of the rotunda of the Hermitage Hotel, circa 1913. The Hermitage Hotel, is a historic hotel located at 231 6th Avenue North in Nashville, Tennessee. The Hermitage Hotel was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1975. The Hermitage Hotel is a member of Historic Hotels of America, the official program of the National Trust for Historic Preservation. Forms part of the Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection. 1 postcard.

titleInfo.title: Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection
